product_name: e.l.f. CosmeticsHoly Strokes Micro-Fine Brow Pen
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty Freee.l.f. Cosmetics' Holy Strokes Micro-Fine Brow Pen features a precision tip for creating thin, hair-like strokes for your most natural-looking brows. Ideal for detailing and leveling up your brows' dimension, the waterproof and smudge-resistant formula stays put for a long-lasting look.
details: DetailsBenefitsMicro-fine brush tip easily creates thin, hair-like strokes for a natural-looking, long-lasting lookLiquid brow pen delivers light, buildable pigment - great for brow pen newbiesIdeal for detailing & adding dimension to your browsWaterproof & smudge-resistant formulae.l.f. is double-certified cruelty-free by Leaping Bunny & PETAe.l.f. is proud to partner with Fair Trade USA & manufacture products in Fair Trade Certified facilities; look for the Fair Trade Certified seal on your e.l.f. productItem 2639444How To UseHold the eyebrow pen upside down for fifteen seconds and shake well to saturate the tip.Flick the brow pen upward to create thin strokes and fill in sparse areas. Apply more pressure for deeper pigment.Replace cap quickly after use.IngredientsNeutral Brown: Water (Aqua), Acrylates Copolymer, Butylene Glycol, Propylene Glycol, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Alcohol, Styrene/Acrylates/Ammonium Methacrylate Copolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Bis-PEG-18 Methyl Ether Dimethyl Silane, Caprylyl Glycol, Ceteareth-25, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, 1,2-Hexanediol, Tocopherol. May Contain: Black 2 (CI 77266) (NANO), Red 40 (CI 16035), Yellow 5 (CI 19140).Ingredients may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the packaging of the product you receive for the list of ingredients in your particular product.
how_to_use: Hold the eyebrow pen upside down for fifteen seconds and shake well to saturate the tip.Flick the brow pen upward to create thin strokes and fill in sparse areas. Apply more pressure for deeper pigment.Replace cap quickly after use.

reviews.headline: Solid Brow Pen
reviews.comments: This is a solid brow pen. I got it in the blonde color, but would be interested to try a slightly darker shade because it is very light. I typically do use brow pens for filling in my sparse brows, and this does a nice job overall. The wear is nice and I don't have any issues with the applicator. For the price you are paying, this is definitely a solid brow pen.

reviews.headline: DO NOT BUY WASTE OF MONEY
reviews.comments: dont buy. Waste of money. No pigment and fragile all this for almost $10 GO BUY NYX EYEBROWS INSTEAD

reviews.headline: Doesn't work
reviews.comments: Bought it first use it was already dried out couldnt even use it sadly

reviews.headline: Do not recommend
reviews.comments: There was absolutely no color. I initially bought Taupe then exchanged that one for the second darkest shade, both pens had no pigment whatsoever.

reviews.headline: Not good!
reviews.comments: I was excited to try this product and even more excited to return it. Very disappointed. Needs way more pigment. Shouldn't have to shake a product a million times for barely anything to come out.

reviews.headline: Not pigmented enough
reviews.comments: This is okay, it is not as pigmented as I thought it would be. It seems to be dry and it takes a little bit doe it to show up and fill in brows. You have to shake in between strokes but I feel it doesn't put out much liquid. I would recommend, but not strongly.

reviews.headline: doesn't show up
reviews.comments: i bought this as a freckle pen since it was similar to  the nyx lift & snatch brow pen i usually use but cheaper. i got taupe at first and it blended into my skin. so i exchanged and tried two shades darker. it looks the same! its way too light idk how anyone would use it for their eyebrows unfortunately

reviews.headline: No I would not like to buy again
reviews.comments: I got the darkest shade! I honestly think the milani eyebrow pencil is better! This shade is to light! I got the darkest one and still isn't the best and dark enough! I don't really like it! I think it's better for people who have light colored eyebrows!

reviews.headline: I love this product !
reviews.comments: Matching perfect with my color and last long

reviews.headline: No pigment
reviews.comments: Pen is a great idea but the formula is terrible no pigment and yessss I shook it. ALOT.

reviews.headline: Get this!
reviews.comments: I cant belive the negative reviews??? I love this eye brow pen omg so easy so natural and last me all day and so easy. I have tried many different ways to fill in and make my eyebrows even and ghis is the best one ever even compared to more expensive ones. Get it!

reviews.headline: Not worth it
reviews.comments: Have to shake a lot every 3 strokes and even then, barely any pigment.

reviews.headline: It's a good option
reviews.comments: I appreciate the price on it. It did what it was suppose to. It filled my missing brow hairs. It did so lightly so it gave me complete control to build the product up. I love having control of the pigment in case I have a heavy hand.

reviews.headline: not worth it
reviews.comments: it sucks, its watery, has no pigment literally does nothing dont waste your money

reviews.headline: Useless
reviews.comments: There's no pigment at all! I had to return it.

reviews.headline: Useless
reviews.comments: I like light brows and extending my brow tail. This is too light for me and I can't imagine it shows up on anyone that isn't paper pale. It's basically nonexistent and does not tattoo or stain well at all either.

reviews.headline: Don't waste your time and money
reviews.comments: it literally gives nothing. there is no pigment, you can shake for days and still won't get pay out. Don't bother with this.

reviews.headline: Pleasantly surprised
reviews.comments: I don't get all the negative reviews. I tested this on the back of my hand and yes, it did look very faint. But then I applied it to my brows and the pigment was there more so than it was on the back of my hand. I tested it out by applying to a clean face right before the gym. And after about 4 hours from running around doing errands and going to the gym I came home and my brows were still perfectly intact. My only con is that it's super tiny. If they could make it dual ended with a bigger side on one end that would be more ideal so there would be more product and I could apply my eyebrows faster. But for the price, you really can't complain definitely worth a try IMO. I also don't understand the previous review stating that it rubbed right off. Because I tested it out on the back of my hand first and went about my day doing dishes and showering and it was still there. I think you definitely have to make sure you shake it like the directions say before applying.

reviews.headline: Does absolutely nothing..
reviews.comments: Used it a few times and it did not make a difference. Barely any color comes out.

reviews.headline: Not great
reviews.comments: Picked this up on vacation last minute and they need to not only improve the component itself but the formula lacks pigment.

media.headline: No I would not like to buy again
media.caption: Eyebrow pencil

faceoff_positive.comments: I don't get all the negative reviews. I tested this on the back of my hand and yes, it did look very faint. But then I applied it to my brows and the pigment was there more so than it was on the back of my hand. I tested it out by applying to a clean face right before the gym. And after about 4 hours from running around doing errands and going to the gym I came home and my brows were still perfectly intact. My only con is that it's super tiny. If they could make it dual ended with a bigger side on one end that would be more ideal so there would be more product and I could apply my eyebrows faster. But for the price, you really can't complain definitely worth a try IMO. I also don't understand the previous review stating that it rubbed right off. Because I tested it out on the back of my hand first and went about my day doing dishes and showering and it was still there. I think you definitely have to make sure you shake it like the directions say before applying.
faceoff_positive.headline: Pleasantly surprised

faceoff_negative.comments: I bought this in neutral brown and dark brown, the neutral brown is blonde/taupe at most and the dark brown is nothing of the sort and is very red/warm. The color is so so sheer and multiple layers hardly make a difference. This leaves a watercolor effect not crisp hair like strokes. I would recommend a different product, this is a miss
faceoff_negative.headline: hard pass
